Package com.freshers.filefixer

Class ReaderCSV

java.lang.Object
com.freshers.filefixer.ReaderCSV
public class ReaderCSV extends Object
This class reads a CSV file and creates record objects for each row in the file. The records are stored in an array after being made

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ReaderCSV()
    Class constructor Initilizes the ArrayList of records

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    File
    getCSVFile(String path)
    Locates all the CSV files inside the folder and returns the CSV file that is found If there is more than one CSV file the program cannot work so an error message is displayed

    getRecords()
    Gets the collection of records
    int

    Locates a CSV file and creates a record for each row in the CSV file.

  • Method Details

    • getCSVFile

      public File getCSVFile(String path)
      Locates all the CSV files inside the folder and returns the CSV file that is found If there is more than one CSV file the program cannot work so an error message is displayed
      Parameters:
      path - Path to the folder containing all the files
      Returns:
      The CSV file that is found id retured

    • readData

      public int readData(String path)
      Locates a CSV file and creates a record for each row in the CSV file. All records are then added to the ArrayList
      Parameters:
      path - Path to folder containing all the PDF files and the CSV
      Returns:
      The amount of records created from the CSV file.

    • getRecords

      public ArrayList<Record> getRecords()
      Gets the collection of records
      Returns:
      The ArrayList of records
